channel.title: RuneMade Project
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]RuneMade[/size]
This server is originally my old server(PK or Scape), but this time it's called RuneMade It will be something that people were/are looking for.. We do have a perfected 459 gameframe exactly as RuneScape back in 2006/07. I've been making researches what gameframe people liked most/misses most and it resulted in 317/459 so I've made a 459 gameframe to get the old memories back (y)
I know I've been making lots of project threads, why care? I got my latest thread locked because I was making this one, if anyone flames or spams will be reported instantly.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RmHKA.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nBJLG.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/B2cQw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/adyQR.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aAx16.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S8QAo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IxwQF.png[/img]
I've you'd like to support this project and follow us please use our banner in your signature or thank us in the thread, reply doesn't take alot either.
Credits Me & R0cky 0wnz[/CENTER]

item.title: RuneMade Project
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Flight, post:21, topic:393230”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=490397.msg3589634#msg3589634 date=1304483601]

Almost all 474 servers have clipped npc’s and players along with the cannon. Also I saw the agility course on a release not to long ago on Rune Server.

Where in this post, suggest that this is a 474 server? He doesn’t even imply that it’s a 474 server, not to mention the 459 game frame.

@op: It’s looking good, already said gl on r-s.

This is all followed by tutorials. The client isn’t an original 317 deob, its Galkons client which already has most of the work put into it. All he did was change the gameframe.
[/quote]

I didn’t saw anything was or wasn’t, I said it’s not based on the 474 protocol. And don’t judge anything by pictures, he’s not showing off the client, he’s showing off the client and the server.[/quote]

He put the pictures up, so i’m judging. Plus, theres nothing to show off.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneMade Project
item.dc:creator: @Flight Flight
item.description:
@Flight wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:20, topic:393230”][quote author=Flight link=topic=490397.msg3589505#msg3589505 date=1304474587]

Almost all 474 servers have clipped npc’s and players along with the cannon. Also I saw the agility course on a release not to long ago on Rune Server.

Where in this post, suggest that this is a 474 server? He doesn’t even imply that it’s a 474 server, not to mention the 459 game frame.

@op: It’s looking good, already said gl on r-s.
[/quote]
This is all followed by tutorials. The client isn’t an original 317 deob, its Galkons client which already has most of the work put into it. All he did was change the gameframe.[/quote]

I didn’t saw anything was or wasn’t, I said it’s not based on the 474 protocol. And don’t judge anything by pictures, he’s not showing off the client, he’s showing off the client and the server.

Read full topic

Almost all 474 servers have clipped npc’s and players along with the cannon. Also I saw the agility course on a release not to long ago on Rune Server.
[/quote]
Where in this post, suggest that this is a 474 server? He doesn’t even imply that it’s a 474 server, not to mention the 459 game frame.

@op: It’s looking good, already said gl on r-s.[/quote]
This is all followed by tutorials. The client isn’t an original 317 deob, its Galkons client which already has most of the work put into it. All he did was change the gameframe.

Looks like you just added NPCs.

[/quote]
Maybe if you put your glasses on you could see npc no-clipping is fixed, a working cannon and a picture of an agility course?[/quote]
Almost all 474 servers have clipped npc’s and players along with the cannon. Also I saw the agility course on a release not to long ago on Rune Server.

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Good luck with the development, mate.
